condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1.2 By 2026, stakeholders (including parents and caregivers) have increased capacity, improved behavior and resources todemand and deliver inclusive and quality early childhood education services.

description.narrative: The year’s efforts have been characterized as creating a policy feedback loop from policy intent to practice in the preschools bringing quality instruction and inclusive child centred methodologies closer to children. UNICEF engagement has also ensured prioritising ECE in the national agenda through TES commitment, National Congress of Education etc. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2023
